thread.section_title: Fine Rug Collection Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fine Rug Collection | finerugcollection.com
thread.title: Bruce R. Anzalone Sr.
thread.title_full: Fine Rug Collection reviewed by Bruce R. Anzalone Sr.

author: Bruce R. Anzalone Sr.
title: Bruce R. Anzalone Sr.
text: Great Rugs,True to the color in the video. Very thick and plush. These rugs exceded our expectations, as we were a little warry of buying something this costly online without seeing it in person. I telephoned the store and spoke to someone there. They were very helpful and knowledgeable. The shipping was very fast and we were updated with e-mails to track the carpets as they made their way to us. Overall a very pleasant experience and we will purchase from this store again.
